tweets.text:
Can @SouthernWater get any worse?

❌The lowest @EnvAgency ranking
❌Endless pollution incidents
❌Subsidiary in a tax haven
❌£212 million profit last year but paid no corporation tax 

We are being ripped off while shareholders profit. Water privatisation has failed @We_OwnIt https://t.co/A3PKKmsobQ

tweets.text:
Don't flush kitchen roll down the loo - it doesn't dissolve the same way as toilet paper.

Flushing it down the loo damages your pipes and can cause flooding.

To protect our environment, always put kitchen roll in the bin.

#Unblocktober https://t.co/ViFB8LlgM4

From birdies to bees and butterflies: how new funding will turn a former golf driving range in Carlisle into a wildlife haven👉 https://t.co/mFdzwLWOk2 Thanks to funding from Cumbria Waste Management Environment Trust & @EnvAgencyNW @CarlisleCC #GetCumbriaBuzzing @HeritageFundNOR https://t.co/bivbf2KQ1c

This week I'm doing a fishy based podcast every day leading up to Oct 24th which is @fishmigration to start the week off I'm speaking to @SEGandrewK about @EelGroup and the amazing life story behind one bizarre fish the eel!

https://t.co/kvL7uWDgFB

https://t.co/Ja2fuu61Oi https://t.co/VQgHkAcMpq

tweets.text:
[1/2] Good to see local councils attempt to stop @ThamesWater discharging raw sewage into public rivers.

As councillor Linda Smith points out, @UKGov has encouraged deregulation & tacitly permitted pollution by slashing funding for @EnvAgency.

Read: https://t.co/e7MzGDifrP https://t.co/liA0XlHLZT
@TyneRiversTrust @EnvAgencyYNE @CoalAuthority Amazing work! Is there any scope for volunteering? Thanks

@EmmaRome6 @Mr_Phil_Black @LizziCollinge We love those side by side maps... endlessly fascinating. 
:  )

A Flood Alert has been issued by @EnvAgency: https://t.co/A6bxOVgLzB for Climping Seafront for the 19 & 20/10/2020. Please take care of yourself, family & neighbours, especially if vulnerable. See the WSCC website for advice on keeping safe & well: https://t.co/kUaigtfCB9 https://t.co/OhRZuh8Aio

tweets.text:
Never put wet wipes, cotton pads or kitchen roll down the toilet.

They don't break down in the same way as toilet paper - leading to blocked sewers. Only flush the 3 Ps - pee, poo and toilet paper.

Share the video to let others know how to protect their pipes this #Unblocktober https://t.co/2fGsxkivfv

tweets.text:
Having a 'trigger' to notify you of a #flood BEFORE it happens can allow time to prepare.

The @EnvAgencyNW Flood Warning Service is one such trigger, but do you know what the different stages mean?

Read our blog to learn more: https://t.co/5Hv1sf3FoV

#preparedness #floodaware https://t.co/eu5AuA3t83

#DidYouKnow while much of the focus for @EnvAgencyNW   #kendal flood scheme is on the @VolkerStevinUK construction element the scheme will also deliver #environment improvements and benefits to the 1970s scheme as set out on the @TheFloodHub https://t.co/p4fqZV5alk https://t.co/MBTFNdtnql

River mersey yesterday, full discharge of s**t. Malfunction, catchment area, extreme weather any other excuses. Fact is this should not be happen, complete failer of the system. Here's our Fisheries Enforcement Officers showing Police Forces in the #NorthWest the various illegal instruments used by poachers for the illegal taking of salmonids and coarse fish.

This partnership work is carried out twice a year with various Police Forces.

#fish https://t.co/hlxA2fbkML

Ensemble pour un kayes propre. @aesanjay @RethinkWaste @LACitySAN @sanwatforall @wasterecycling @Recycleopedia @EASY_CHART @YESFullCircle @Recyclebank @WasteManagement @theplasticfree2 @plast2bcleaned @PlasticsWorld @Adv_Recycling @PlasticsEurope @EnvAgency @TrashTastePod https://t.co/nDXgWf9nso
Long run this morning. Contemplating what will be my last working week as a police officer. Very strange feeling. @runners_blue @ResponsePS https://t.co/D8o1vR6gas

@UnderwaterMedia @CertusCC @mark__mcg @AnglingTrust @sascampaigns @HugoSAS @theriverstrust @amyslack84 @mattymarlow @EnvAgency Northumbrian Water was told to reduce its bills by 25%. Pretty sure that’s not going to result in improved physical performance or investment. I agree with you by the way, left the industry after 40 years working on wastewater construction and management. I’d had enough!

River mersey, another failer towards our rivers, Remind me again how many hours of waste entered our rivers, how much the water firms make. It is time those in charge stepped up. NO EXCUSE. @AnglingTrust @sascampaigns @HugoSAS @theriverstrust @amyslack84 video from @mattymarlow https://t.co/eRbL5xe29f

@Plasmadreamer @CertusCC @mark__mcg @AnglingTrust @sascampaigns @HugoSAS @theriverstrust @amyslack84 @mattymarlow @EnvAgency well the regulation aint working is it, it is a series of failings by all involved not just one party.

@UnderwaterMedia @CertusCC @mark__mcg @AnglingTrust @sascampaigns @HugoSAS @theriverstrust @amyslack84 @mattymarlow @EnvAgency I’m just trying to understand why you have a problem with investors into the water companies being paid a dividend? The Industry is VERY heavily regulated and OFWAT are there to scrutinise the companies performance and set their income and spending plans.
